description:
WiFiman is a desktop app which can scan local network for active devices and configure them.


Overview: * WiFiman Desktop 1.1.0 adds support for macOS 15 and Windows ARM. Improvements: * Added WiFi Scan tab. * Added macOS 15 support. * Added Windows ARM support. * Improved overall app design. * Improved loading speed across the app. * Improved Teleport experience. * Updated Settings tab. * Adjusted Teleport console list. * Reduced app bundle size significantly. * Set "Scan" tab a default tab when opening the app. Bugfixes: * Other minor bug fixes and stability improvements. Known issues: * After updating from version 0.3.0 Teleport invites will need to re-invited. Additional information: * macOS (Intel / Apple Silicon) - Minimal version required: macOS 13 * Windows - Minimal version required: Windows 10 * Linux - Minimal version required: Ubuntu 22.xx (24.xx not supported)
